```{r}
winter = read.csv("/home/RHHLab/Research/Five_Rivers/Python/winter.csv")
rainy =  read.csv("/home/RHHLab/Research/Five_Rivers/Python/rainy.csv")
```

```{r}
winter <- winter[,-1]
winter
```

```{r}
fc <- factanal(winter, factors = 3, rotation = "varimax")
fc
```

```{r}
fc$loadings
```

```{r}
write.csv(fc$loadings, "Factor_loadings_Winter.csv")
```

```{r}

fc
```

```{r}
require(factoextra)
require(FactoMineR)
```

```{r}
sample2 <- PCA(data.frame(winter), graph = FALSE, ncp = 3,  scale.unit = TRUE)
eig.val <- get_eigenvalue(sample2)
eig.val
```

```{r}
sample2 <- PCA(data.frame(rainy), graph = FALSE, ncp = 3,  scale.unit = TRUE)
eig.val <- get_eigenvalue(sample2)
eig.val
```

```{r}

cu <- max(pc$weights[3,])

cd <- max(pc$weights[5,])
pb <- max(pc$weights[6,])
```
